Hello,

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder, as we noticed that you received a parcel for a return under guarantee more than 3 working days ago on 31/05/2024. We would like to remind you that the refund period is 2 working days in the event of a technical problem.

Please notify us of the refund within the next 24 working hours, failing which we will have to proceed with the refund in accordance with the Back Market charter.

Thank you in advance for your help,
N-Da-Jean-Elyotte from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the deadline. Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
